```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE, echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE)
```

```{r spades4dummies}
filesToCopy <- dir(pattern = "dl_.*Rmd", full.names = TRUE)
filesToRender <- gsub(filesToCopy, pattern = "dl_", replacement = "")
lapply(filesToRender, rmarkdown::render)
```
